Posts.Content: Aug 23, 2009 05:33AM Nebraskagrandma wrote: did you have a bilateral MX ? I had a unilateral and I still get a mammo on the right side although I have a small implant on that side. On my MX side my oncologist surgeon sees me every 6 months and he does a breast check, he feels all the areas of my lymph nodes, my neck and my recon left breast. That is the only check I have now.
